Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 17th overall pick, by New York (A) in 2012...
Injured on 8/31/2012 with a Inflamed Bicep Tendon, out for 4 weeks...
Injured on 6/28/2013 with a Stiff Shoulder, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 8/8/2013 with a Strained Rotator Cuff Muscle, out for 5 weeks...
Traded from New York (A) to New York (N) on 2/4/2014 (Going to NYN: P E. Butler. Going to NYA: 1B C. Herrera)...
Earned first career win on 4/26/2014...
Had first career hit (double) on 6/17/2014, off Ivan Nova (PHI)...
Won Gold Glove Award at Pitcher in 2016...
Injured on 5/26/2019 with a Sore Back, out for one week...
Injured on 8/11/2023 with a Torn Ligament Elbow, out for full season...
